title: The Maxx: Maxxed Out, Vol. 3
features: is collected here in all its freshly-colored glory. Taking remastered pages from
, this new volume collects the final issues of the series, #25-35.Originally published by Image Comics starting in 1993,

became a cult hit of independent comics spawning a TV show on MTV. The series follows its titular hero in the real world as a vagrant and in an alternate reality called The Outback, where he sees himself as a superhero and protector of the Jungle Queen, represented by Julie Winters, a social worker and friend. The series lasted for 35 issues and ended in 1998.
